alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 06 at 3:00PM CDT until October 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI...SOUTHWEST AND SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA AND THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS AND CRITICALLY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... ...A FIRE WEATHER WATCH IS IN EFFECT FOR SUNDAY FOR SOUTHWEST AND SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA FOR DRY FUELS AND VERY LOW HUMIDITIES... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE AND INLAND SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 067, 075, 076, 078, 079, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205 and 206. * WINDS...North 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
